00008 #include "CIntro.h"
00009 #include "../sdl/CInput.h"
00010 #include "../sdl/CVideoDriver.h"
00011 #include "../sdl/CTimer.h"
00012 
00013 CIntro::CIntro()
00014 {
00015  for(size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(mp_bm)/sizeof(mp_bm[0]); ++i) mp_bm[i] = NULL;
00016  m_timer = 0;
00017  m_introtime = 10;  // Total time (in seconds) to elapse until Main menu opens
00018  m_scrolly = 200;
00019  m_finished = false;
00020  mp_bmp_surface = g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface;
00021  SDL_FillRect(mp_bmp_surface, NULL, 0);
00022 }
00023 
00024 void CIntro::init()
00025 {
00026  // Load the Title Bitmap
00027  mp_bm[0] = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("AN");
00028  mp_bm[1] = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("APOGEE");
00029  mp_bm[2] = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("PRESENT");
00030  mp_bm[3] = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("OFAN");
00031  mp_bm[4] = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("IDSOFT");
00032  mp_bm[5] = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("PRODUCT");
00033  
00034  for(int j=0 ; j<6 ; j++)
00035  {
00036   if(mp_bm[j] == NULL)
00037    continue;
00038   if (j==0)
00039    m_mid[j] = (320/2)-((mp_bm[j]->getWidth()+4)/2);
00040   else
00041    m_mid[j] = (320/2)-(mp_bm[j]->getWidth()/2);
00042  }
00043  
00044  g_pTimer->ResetSecondsTimer();
00045 }
00046 
00047 void CIntro::process()
00048 {
00049  if( m_timer<1 ) m_timer++;
00050  else
00051  {
00052   m_timer=0;
00053   if( m_scrolly>42 ) m_scrolly--;
00054  }
00055  
00056  if(mp_bm[0] != NULL)
00057  {
00058   mp_bm[1]->draw( mp_bmp_surface, m_mid[1], m_scrolly+11);
00059 
00060   if(m_scrolly<=42) // Show this, when scrolling is finished
00061   {
00062    mp_bm[0]->draw( mp_bmp_surface, m_mid[0], m_scrolly);
00063    mp_bm[2]->draw( mp_bmp_surface, m_mid[2], m_scrolly+40);
00064    mp_bm[3]->draw( mp_bmp_surface, m_mid[3], m_scrolly+52);
00065    mp_bm[4]->draw( mp_bmp_surface, m_mid[4], m_scrolly+66);
00066    mp_bm[5]->draw( mp_bmp_surface, m_mid[5], m_scrolly+108);
00067   }
00068  }
00069  
00070  // Check if time for Intro is out
00071  if(g_pTimer->HasSecElapsed())
00072  {
00073   if(m_introtime <= 0) m_finished = true;
00074   else m_introtime--;
00075  }
00076 }
